entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
